snippet.title: Dead Island Definitive - Launch Trailer
snippet.description:
Welcome to the  Zombie Apocalypse experience of a lifetime! Trapped in a tropical paradise you lead a group of Survivors , fighting your way through hordes of Zombies on the search for a cure.

Experience this genre classic now fully re-mastered with the Dead Island Definitive Collection! 

Available now on PlayStation 4, Xbox One, and PC!

More info at: http://deadisland.deepsilver.com

Follow us for the latest news and updates on Dead Island!
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/deadislandgame
Twitter: https://twitter.com/deadislandgame
